item.title: Oops I Committed My Password to Githup Python
item.description: Did you ever commit a password to githup? You may accidently commit your password to githup right after tseting your program How to fix a password leak accident? Don’t Make a new commit with password removed!! Don’t rebase the commit! REVOKE the password! make sure the password is not valid anymore Preventing Password Leaks in Code This is Wrong! password = '*#HelloThisMyPassword!' secret_key = '^CanYouHackMe?$' url = 'https://username:password@site.com' This is Right
